channel.title: Job Market on Luke M. Perez, Ph.D.
channel.description: Recent content in Job Market on Luke M. Perez, Ph.D.

item.title: APSA 2017, Job Market Edition
item.description: Heading to ‘Frisco for APSA this week.^[NB: I use this term ‘frisco’ not without some reservation as I know locals of San Francisco loath it with a fiery passion of a 1000 suns. But as a native of Southern California, I couldn’t resist.] Not much planned save for flurry of job market interviews and meetings with old colleagues, advisors, and friends. To be sure, I planned this trip not without some degree of trepidation.
